subject: Snow and Snowstorms
Football
lead_paragraph: After Detroit’s victory over Green Bay, workers scrubbed the Lions logos from the field to paint the Vikings colors in an attempt to give the field a look of a home game for Monday’s matchup with the Giants.
snippet: After Detroit’s victory over Green Bay, workers scrubbed the Lions logos from the field to paint the Vikings colors in an attempt to give the field a look of a home game for Monday’s matchup with the Giants.
